text:
Hey all : )
I am currently using HubSpot's meeting link for demo sign-ups, which is embedded on my website under my domain. Additionally, the tracking code is embedded on the site.
However, I've noticed an issue with the tracking of incoming leads. Despite our efforts, the original source of these leads is being recorded as direct traffic.
In reality, these leads should be attributed to paid search (ads properties are not being populated as well...)
All UTMs are preserved from the first click on the ad up until the final (demo submission).
Has anyone ever faced that issue and can assist?
Did anyone made a workaround for webhook subscription for custom object record deletation?
Thanks, I did what you suggested and found it! :slightly_smiling_face:

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

What’s your CMS? I ran into this issue with Wix where it creates an iframe for the HubSpot form embed and therefore the conversion happens on a different domain. It’s infuriating but thankfully that client was already rebuilding their site on Wordpress
Hi, guys and gals! I'm new to HubSpot. :smile:

Anyone here familiar with Make-HubSpot integration?

<https://www.make.com/en/help/app/HubSpot-crm>
Is it still working? I've been trying but I'm getting weird errors.
Matt, did you ever find a solution here? I have the same goal to delay and/or trigger a workflow based on a specific datetime property without having to specify a time of day.
